thread.section_title: Kayak Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Kayak | www.kayak.com
thread.title: Ron Brinkman

author: Ron Brinkman
title: Ron Brinkman
text:
The web site boasted that I should book direct with Kayak - what could be better? SURPRISE - Kayak diverts the booking to a scam site Webjet.com. This company lied, saying my credit card charge had been declined, delaying the actual booking of the ticket by more than two days. Then, GUESS WHAT? THE PRICE HAD DOUBLED! They're looking for suckers desperate enough to pay double.
KAYAK needs to stand behind their offers or close their doors. I checked the Kayak offering continually for several hours after I submitted my order, confirming that the low price was still there for plenty of time for the booking to have been made. This scam appears to be just one of many on the Kayak web site based on other reviews I see.
